title: How an enormous project attempted to map the sky without computers
excerpt: The Carte du Ciel provided signposts for how future astronomical discoveries would be made.

title: Google’s cost-cutting kills Pixelbook division
excerpt: Google hasn't made a laptop in 3 years, and won't be making one anytime soon.

title: Ubisoft is pretending it was never really that interested in NFTs

title: Meta spins off PyTorch Foundation to make AI framework vendor neutral
excerpt: PyTorch, which powers Tesla Autopilot and 150K other projects, will join the Linux Foundation.

excerpt: Apple's past and present OSes are all getting updates today.

title: The 103 classic games that did, and didn’t, make the

title: The clock speed wars are back as Intel brags about hitting 6 GHz with 13th-gen CPUs
excerpt: Raptor Lake boosts clocks, cache, and core counts on the same Intel 7 process.

title: Dear Mr. President: Seriously, please stop with these science “moonshots”
excerpt: Science needs sustainable, boring growth, but we just get flashy ill-formed initiatives.
